programlisting:
<Extension syslog> Module xm_syslog </Extension>
<Input in> Module im_uds UDS /dev/log Exec parse_syslog_bsd(); </Input>
<Processor pattern> Module pm_pattern PatternFile /var/lib/nxlog/patterndb.xml </Processor>
<Output out> Module om_file File "/var/log/messages" </Output>
<Route 1> Path in => pattern => out </Route>
